avatarContent.name: Toa Kiryu
avatarContent.description: I build beautiful products using the latest technologies and frameworks.I am a developer who is passionate about building great products.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a student living in Japan who started programming as a hobby in elementary school. Initially, I created static websites using HTML and CSS, but now I develop websites and other projects using the trending React. My favorite programming language is TypeScript, and my favorite framework is Next.js.

items.react: A library for building user interfaces for web and native applications
items.typescript: A programming language that is a superset of JavaScript
items.nextjs: A React framework for web development

serverWorldMap.title: Using {service}
serverWorldMap.description: Hosting websites from servers around the world using a cloud hosting service.

titleContent.description: This is the project overview page of Toa Kiryu. This list does not necessarily include all the projects created or contributed to.

listItems.1: The personal information you provide will be used to respond to your inquiries and provide information.
listItems.2: If personal information is not entered correctly or depending on the content of your inquiry, we may not be able to respond.
listItems.3: Depending on the content of your inquiry, it may take some time to respond.
